All is well and the couple lives in marital bliss. Priya discovers that she is pregnant. Unfortunately, she miscarries. Not only does she lose the baby, but she also becomes incapable of conceiving ever again. An article about surrogate mothers leads Priya to embark on this course. Raj, though hesitant, is referred to Madhubala (Preity Zinta) a prostitute who agrees to bear a child in return for money. She meets car-thief Karan (Arya Babbar) and so begins her journey into a past life, as Nandini, the lover of a freedom fighter (also Arya Babbar) who was killed by a pro-British traitor. programme.title: Fantastic Four: Rise Of The Silver Surfer
programme.desc: Comic book adventure follows Fantastic Four superheroes Reed (Ioan Gruffudd), Sue (Jessica Alba), Johnny (Chris Evans) and Ben (Michael Chiklis) as they battle the enigmatic Silver Surfer (Doug Jones), who travels the earth preparing it for total destruction. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Air Force One
programme.desc: The legendary Harrison Ford dons the role of the president of the United States of America, who journeys to Russia and speaks out against terrorism, in this action-packed film directed by the talented Wolfgang Petersen. Trepidation sets in when his family and he are taken as hostages while aboard the 'Air Force One' by those who are out to incite global terror forcing the President to rise to the occasion and combat the crisis at hand. (Film - Action)

programme.title: No Good Deed
programme.desc: Terri Henson lives a peaceful life along with her husband Jeffery and her two children Sam and Ryan. While Jeffery is away to meet his father, a charming stranger arrives at the Hensons asking for help with his car. He introduces himself as Colin Evans and Terri invites him over for food as it is dinner time. Terri's good deed soon turns out to be a terrible mistake when Colin kills her friend Meg and holds her family hostage. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: The Bourne Identity
programme.desc: A man with a bullet-ridden body is found and looked after by strangers. He wakes up to a blank memory and begins a journey to find out his identity. The road ahead is full of danger and conspiracy. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes program that includes the making and a chat with the cast and crew of the movie. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Oblivion
programme.desc: Jack Harper, a drone repairman stationed on Earth that has been ravaged by war with extraterrestrials, questions his identity after rescuing the woman who keeps appearing in his dreams. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Cars
programme.desc: A big league racing car, Lightning McQueen, learns an important lesson in life when he rams into the pavements of Radiator Springs and is ordered to repave the roads again. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Turbo
programme.desc: A garden snail named Theo dreams of winning the Indy 500 race. But his obsession with speed makes him an outcast in the slow-paced snail community. Later, an accident fuses Theo's DNA with nitrous oxide, gifting him incredible speed and accuracy. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: League of Gods
programme.desc: (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: The Predator
programme.desc: Quinn McKenna, an army sniper, along with some fugitives and a scientist, sets out to kill the Predator and save Rory, his son, who was abducted as his autism reflects advancement in human evolution. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Johnny English Strikes Again
programme.desc: In the third instalment of the 'Johnny English' series, English, a retired M17 agent, currently working as a geography teacher, is entrusted with a secret mission. He teams up with his old aide Bough to investigate a cyber-attack that revealed the identity of Britain's intelligence agents. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: 5 Star Kitchen - ITC Chef's Special
programme.desc: With their magical touch, top chefs from ITC transform everyday ingredients into spectacular dishes belonging to different cuisines. They also interact with the guest chef and share culinary secrets. (TV Show - Cooking)

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers stand on opposite sides when world leaders try to interfere with their activities. With the two superhero factions--led by Captain America and Iron Man--pit against each other, are the Avengers doomed. (Film - Action)

programme.title: League of Gods
programme.desc: (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Master Z: Ip Man Legacy
programme.desc: A disgraced martial artist's simple life is disturbed when he inadvertently fights a group of drug dealers. As the conflict deepens, several people around him are threatened. As a result, he is forced to rise against a very powerful and dangerous drug lord. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Avengers: Age Of Ultron
programme.desc: The second instalment of the 'Avengers' franchise brings the superheroes back together and this time, the stakes are higher than ever. With a view to stop the world from fighting anymore, Tony Stark enlists Bruce Banner's help to create an artificial intelligence called Ultron. But Tony's habit of playing God will end up costing the world as Ultron's personality takes charge of a robot's body, manufacturing several more like himself to declare war on the human race. Iron Man, Hulk, Captain America, Thor, Hawkeye and Black Widow are joined by a trusted few as they take on this very dangerous villain. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Planes
programme.desc: Dusty, a crop duster plane, dreams of becoming a great air racer. Along with his friend, Chug, a fuel truck, Dusty practises flying manoeuvres in order to qualify for the Wings Across the Globe race. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Air Force One
programme.desc: The legendary Harrison Ford dons the role of the president of the United States of America, who journeys to Russia and speaks out against terrorism, in this action-packed film directed by the talented Wolfgang Petersen. Trepidation sets in when his family and he are taken as hostages while aboard the 'Air Force One' by those who are out to incite global terror forcing the President to rise to the occasion and combat the crisis at hand. (Film - Action)

programme.title: A Bug's Life
programme.desc: Flik, an odd ball of an ant, may be pint sized but he has tremendous courage. When the anthill he resides in is threatened by arrogant grasshoppers, he sets out to create an army to deal with them, recruiting the most incompetent bugs of course. A man with exceptional humour inducing skills, Dave Foley lends his voice to play Flik. Directors John Lasseter, and Andrew Stanton procure some of the biggest names on television and film for 'A Bug's Life'. Julia Louis-Dreyfuss, Kevin Spacey and Hayden Pannettiere are but a few. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Lucy in the Sky
programme.desc: Lucy Cola, an astronaut, returns to Earth from her first space mission and begins to feel disconnected from normal life. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Prince Of Persia: The Sands Of Time
programme.desc: With the help of a special, magical dagger that can help reverse time, a young prince and a princess must stop an evil villain whose actions threaten to destroy the world. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Chronicles Of Narnia: The Lion, The Witch And The Wardrobe
programme.desc: While playing, Lucy and her siblings find a wardrobe that lands them in a mystical place called Narnia. Here they realise that it was fated and they must now unite with Aslan to defeat an evil queen. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Maleficent
programme.desc: Maleficent is a kind-hearted fairy, who is deceived by the love of her life, Stefan. Soon, she places a curse on his daughter, Aurora, in order to exact revenge. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Toy Story 3
programme.desc: Director Lee Unkrich's long time association with Pixar comes handy as he directs the Academy-award winning third instalment in the 3D computer animated comedy trilogy 'Toy Story'. With an ensemble cast consisting of actors like Tom Hanks and Tim Allen rendering their celebrated voiceovers, this visually appetising and emotionally enchanting animation takes viewers in the mysterious world of anthropomorphic toys Woody, Buzz and the gang, who find themselves in the company of untamed, uncivilised tots. Woody and Buzz must plan their great escape with the help of their newly found friends. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: 5 Star Kitchen - ITC Chef's Special

programme.title: Hell or High Water
programme.desc: Brothers Toby and Tanner plan a series of robberies against a bank that is about to take possession of their family ranch. But while they are planning their final heist, Marcus, a soon-to-retire Texas Ranger, begins closing in on them. (Film - Crime)

programme.title: Flubber
programme.desc: Robin Williams plays the absent-minded Professor Phillip Brainard in this fun-filled film that looks at the adventures that follow after he creates a rubber-like bouncy substance, Flubber, which helps object fly. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: This live-action retelling of the Disney classic follows Belle, who has taken her father's place in the Beast's castle and befriended its enchanted servants. She soon discovers the reason behind the creature's frightful exterior and begins appreciating his true nature. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.desc: A blacksmith joins forces with Captain Jack Sparrow, a pirate, in a bid to free the love of his life from Jack's associates, who kidnapped her suspecting she has the medallion. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.desc: Sabrina fights a legal battle against Manish, the son of an influential politician, who killed her sister Jessica. However, due to corruption and inefficiency of the system, Manish and his friends are acquitted and Sabrina loses hope in the judiciary system. Meanwhile, Meera, a journalist, takes interest in the case and exposes the conspiracy and corruption. Meera even initiates a candle-lit procession that starts a widespread protest, which leads to the conviction of the culprits. (Film - Biography/Biopic)

programme.desc: Arthur Dent has just lost his perfect woman to another and as if that wasn't enough, his friend, who actually turns out to be an alien, informs him about Earth's impending doom. Soon, Arthur is whisked away from Earth seconds before it is exploded to make way for a new hyperspace motorway. Plus, there are other woes such as being wanted by the police, Earth II, an insane electronic encyclopaedia, the absences of tea and so on and so forth. But, Arthur's day is not entirely lost because he now stands a chance to win back his lady love while being on the greatest adventure off Earth. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Penguins Of Madagascar
programme.desc: Taking up from where the 2012 movie of the 'Madagascar' franchise left off, Skipper, Kowalski, Rico and Private find themselves in Italy, all set for a new adventure. Tom McGrath, Chris Miller, Conrad Vernon and Christopher Knights give their voices to the four delightful penguins who join forces with a spy organisation, The North Wind, and gear up to impede the evil Dr. Octavius Brine from exterminating the world. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: A possible assassination of the Chinese premier and a conspiracy involving the MI-7, KGB and the CIA force the bosses at MI-7 to recall their brave but unconventional agent, Johnny English, who after a failed mission is seeking a shot at redemption. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Wreck-It Ralph
programme.desc: Ralph is tired of playing the role of a bad guy and embarks on a journey to become a video game hero. But Ralph accidentally lets loose a deadly enemy that threatens the entire arcade. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Ice Age: Continental Drift
programme.desc: In the wake of a calamity of epic proportions, Manny is separated from Ellie and Peached and is left with Diego, Sid and his grandmother on an iceberg. As they attempt to return to his family, the motley friends are apprehended by pirates. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon 2
programme.desc: Hiccup and Toothless find themselves in a new battle against a mysterious Dragon Rider, Drago. He wants to start a war using the dragons to rule the world. The two, along with their friends, must stand up and fight against Drago together if they want to change the future for both humans and dragons. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Iron Man 2
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Home Alone 3
programme.desc: Eight-year-old Alex fends off thieves who are trying to acquire a top-secret computer chip that they have hidden in his toy car, with which they intend to help a terrorist group. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Boyka: Undisputed IV
programme.desc: After he accidentally kills his opponent, underground fighter Yuri Boyka questions everything he stands for and tries to win the freedom of the dead man's wife through a series of fights. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Doomsday
programme.desc: (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
programme.desc: An immensely powerful ancient mutant rises again and wishes to cleanse humankind in order to create a new world order. He recruits some powerful mutants, making them believe that mutants are superior to humans and it is their right to rule. To counter him, Raven tries to pull Charles out of his depressed state and lead a team of X-Men. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
programme.desc: A blacksmith joins forces with Captain Jack Sparrow, a pirate, in a bid to free the love of his life from Jack's associates, who kidnapped her suspecting she has the medallion. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: The Rock
programme.desc: Sean Connery and Nicolas Cage star in this film that centres on an influential man who leads an army of military men to attack the city of San Francisco, only to be faced by a chemical weapon expert and an ex-con who join forces to stop the destruction. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide To The Galaxy
programme.desc: Arthur Dent has just lost his perfect woman to another and as if that wasn't enough, his friend, who actually turns out to be an alien, informs him about Earth's impending doom. Soon, Arthur is whisked away from Earth seconds before it is exploded to make way for a new hyperspace motorway. Plus, there are other woes such as being wanted by the police, Earth II, an insane electronic encyclopaedia, the absences of tea and so on and so forth. But, Arthur's day is not entirely lost because he now stands a chance to win back his lady love while being on the greatest adventure off Earth. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Primeval
programme.desc: An American news crew lands in Burundi to capture footage of a deadly crocodile. However, a violent warlord who stalks the region makes them his target. (Film - Horror)

programme.title: Finding Dory
programme.desc: In the spinoff of 2003 animated adventure movie, 'Finding Nemo', Dory, the forgetful tang fish, remembers her parents in a flashback. She ventures out on a journey to the Jewel of Morro Bay along with Merlin and Nemo. They encounter numerous struggles on the way until a childhood memory guides Dory home. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Maleficent
programme.desc: Maleficent is a kind-hearted fairy, who is deceived by the love of her life, Stefan. Soon, she places a curse on his daughter, Aurora, in order to exact revenge. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Starship Troopers
programme.desc: After successfully completing graduation, Johnny Rico joins a military group and begins his training. Soon, he finds himself battling gigantic alien bug-like creatures who are on a mission to destroy Earth. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Chinese Zodiac
programme.desc: With the twelve ancient animal signs in the Chinese Zodiac stolen, Asian Hawk, a mercenary, sets out to retrieve them. He is accompanied by a Chinese student and a Parisian lady in his mission. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: Set in an alternate universe where both dinosaurs and humans exist, this animated adventure follows the unlikely friendship between Arlo, an Apatosaurus, and a feral caveboy. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Jungle Book
programme.desc: Mowgli, a boy raised by wolves, is forced to go to the human village by his friend Bagheera and the animal clan when a man-eating tiger vows to kill him. Along the way, he meets a lazy bear, Baloo, a vicious snake, Kaa, and a smooth-talking ape, King Louie. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Iron Man 2
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader
programme.desc: Lucy, Edmund and Eustace are stranded in Cambridge. They return to Narnia where they meet Prince Caspian. He explains to them that in the while that they were away, the face of Narnia has changed. Together, they realise that their homeland is under threat from green mist. They set out to find Lord Telmar, a close confidante of Caspian's father, in order to restore peace. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Mulan
programme.desc: Young Mulan is distraught to learn that her weak father must join the army to fight the invading Huns. Unwilling to endanger his life, she disguises herself as a man and joins the army in his place. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Percy Jackson: Sea Of Monsters
programme.desc: Percy Jackson, the son of Posedion, decides to uphold Thalia's sacrifice. Thalia had sacrificed herself to get the others into her camp and her father Zeus found another way for her to live by transforming her into a pine tree, creating a magical border around the camp so that no other half-blood would suffer from a fate as she did. For this, he embarks on a journey, with his friends Annabeth, Clarisse and half-brother, Tyson, to the Sea of Monsters to find the Golden Fleece which has the power to save their home and training ground, Camp Half-Blood. (Film - Fantasy)

But Baby Bink turns out to be more than a hand full for the crooks. (Film - Comedy)

programme.desc: After Scrat's pursuit of an acorn sets off a series of asteroids to strike Earth, Manny, Sid, Diego and their herd must find a way to survive the impending doom. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom
programme.desc: Three years after Jurassic World is destroyed, Claire Dennis, its former manager, is recruited to save its dinosaurs from an impending volcano. She enlists the help of Owen Grady, a velociraptor trainer. But the duo soon discovers that the dinosaurs may be in a bigger peril than they anticipated. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Van Helsing
programme.desc: Having earned himself a reputation, Van Helsing is a monster hunter known to destroy all forms of evil. His latest mission is in Transylvania where he teams up with Anna to defeat Count Dracula. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Pacific Rim: Uprising
programme.desc: A decade after his father's death in the Battle of the Breach, Jake Pentecost forfeits his Jaeger training and makes a living off the black market. But the rise of a new Kaiju threat finds him teaming up with his adoptive sister, Mako Mori, co-pilot Nate Lambert and 15-year-old Jaeger enthusiast Amara Namani to prevent a global catastrophe. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Game Plan
programme.desc: Unaware that he has an eight-year-old daughter, quarterback Joe Kingman transforms from an egotistical bachelor into a loving father when the child suddenly enters his life. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Finding Nemo
programme.desc: After his son, Nemo, gets abducted in the Great Barrier Reef and is despatched to a fish tank in a dentist's office in Sydney, Marlin, a meek clownfish, embarks on a journey to bring him home. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Rock
programme.desc: Sean Connery and Nicolas Cage star in this film that centres on an influential man who leads an army of military men to attack the city of San Francisco, only to be faced by a chemical weapon expert and an ex-con who join forces to stop the destruction. (Film - Action)

programme.title: G-Force
programme.desc: This action adventure movie is directed by Hoyt Yeatman and Hoyt Yeatman IV. The tale of four hamsters on a dangerous mission, led by a brown hamster, Darwin voiced by Sam Rockwell. His team members include Mooch, Juarez and Speckles, all of whom bring a little bit of madness to the mission. The prolific Nicholas Cage lends his voice to play Speckles, while comedians Tracy Morgan and Dee Bradley Baker voice Juarez and Mooch respectively. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Toy Story 2
programme.desc: When Woody is toy-napped by a greedy toy collector and is nowhere to be found, Buzz and his friends set out to rescue him. But Woody too is tempted by the idea of becoming immortal in a museum. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Chinese Zodiac
programme.desc: With the twelve ancient animal signs in the Chinese Zodiac stolen, Asian Hawk, a mercenary, sets out to retrieve them. He is accompanied by a Chinese student and a Parisian lady in his mission. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Sorcerer's Apprentice
programme.desc: An average-looking Dave (Jay Baruchel) is recruited as an apprentice by master sorcerer Balthazar Blake (Nicholas Cage). Together, they must save Manhattan from Blake's arch-nemesis Maxim Horvath. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Game Plan
programme.desc: Unaware that he has an eight-year-old daughter, quarterback Joe Kingman transforms from an egotistical bachelor into a loving father when the child suddenly enters his life. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Dragonball: Evolution
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Pearl Harbor
programme.desc: Childhood friends Rafe and Danny become army pilots and meet Evelyn, a navy nurse. However, the three of them later find themselves in the middle of the attack on Pearl Harbour during World War II. (Film - War)

programme.title: Alice In Wonderland
programme.desc: Based on the classic novel, this film follows 19-year-old Alice, who discovers a magical world strikingly similar to the nightmares she had as a child. As she meets and befriends one bizarre character after the other, she realises that it is her destiny to end the tyranny of the evil Red Queen by defeating the Jabberwocky. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Tim Burton's The Nightmare Before Christmas
programme.desc: Jack Skellington, a being from Halloween Town, finds Christmas Town and is instantly enchanted. The situation becomes riveting when his obsession with Christmas leads him to abduct Santa Claus. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
programme.desc: The film, which is a directorial debut of Joe Johnston, tells the story of an absent-minded inventor who leaves his latest creation, an electromagnetic shrinking machine, unattended in his attic. The machine shrinks his and his neighbour's kids to 1/4-th of an inch, when they accidentally trigger it. When the newly tiny youngsters are tossed out with the trash, they must survive the long journey across the lawn. (Film - Family)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes program that includes the making and a chat with the cast and crew of the movie. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: The Rock
programme.desc: Sean Connery and Nicolas Cage star in this film that centres on an influential man who leads an army of military men to attack the city of San Francisco, only to be faced by a chemical weapon expert and an ex-con who join forces to stop the destruction. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: Set in an alternate universe where both dinosaurs and humans exist, this animated adventure follows the unlikely friendship between Arlo, an Apatosaurus, and a feral caveboy. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Captain Marvel
programme.desc: In 1995, Starforce member Vers and her team are sent to Earth in order to rescue an undercover operative infiltrating the Skrulls, the shapeshifters. During her mission, Vers gets separated from her team and is stranded on Earth. She meets S.H.I.E.L.D. Agent Nick Fury and with his help finds out that she had a life on Earth. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Croods
programme.desc: Grug and his family embark on a journey to search for a new place to live after their cave is destroyed. A young boy helps them trek through unknown places to find new shelter. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Lion King
programme.desc: Mufasa, the noble lion king of the Pride Lands of Africa, is killed trying to save his young son from a trap set by his evil brother Scar. He then declares himself king and tries to kill Simba. However, Simba escapes and grows up in the company of outcasts Timon and Pumbaa, a meerkat and warthog. Years later, Simba has a chance encounter with Nala the lioness who urges him to return to the pride and take his rightful place as the king. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Boss Baby
programme.desc: Seven-year-old Tim gets jealous when his parents give all their attention to his little brother. Tim soon learns that the baby can talk and the two team up to foil the plans of the CEO of Puppy Co. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: In this computer-animated science-fiction comedy, an alien race, The Boov, invade Earth and relocate the inhabitants whom they consider inferior to themselves. On the other hand, Tip Tucci, a young girl, avoids getting captured during the invasion and teams up with Oh on a mission to find her mother. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: League of Gods
programme.desc: (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Life Of Pi
programme.desc: Celebrated director Ang Lee conjures spectacular images out of Yann Martel's bestseller of the same name and presents this story of endurance and self-discovery in which Pi (Suraj Sharma), a young man, finds himself between a rock and a hard place when he survives a disastrous shipwreck, only to discover that his life boat has another passenger, a ferocious Bengal tiger called Richard Parker. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Gladiator

programme.title: Oz The Great And Powerful
programme.desc: Oscar Diggs, a magician, works in a travelling circus in Kansas. Known to have a reputation of being a womaniser, Oscar falls in love with the circus strongman's wife. Fearing that he may be caught, he escapes in a hot air balloon. A strong tornado sweeps his balloon to the Land of Oz where he meets Theodora, a naive witch. Theodora assumes that he is a wizard hired to kill her competitor, the Wicked Witch. (Film - Adventure)

programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Toy Story 3
programme.desc: Director Lee Unkrich's long time association with Pixar comes handy as he directs the Academy-award winning third instalment in the 3D computer animated comedy trilogy 'Toy Story'. With an ensemble cast consisting of actors like Tom Hanks and Tim Allen rendering their celebrated voiceovers, this visually appetising and emotionally enchanting animation takes viewers in the mysterious world of anthropomorphic toys Woody, Buzz and the gang, who find themselves in the company of untamed, uncivilised tots. Woody and Buzz must plan their great escape with the help of their newly found friends. (Film - Animation)

programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: The Pacifier
programme.desc: Vin Diesel dons the role of an FBI agent who is allotted the most bizarre assignment of his life in this rib-tickling and enthralling film. Unable to save a brilliant scientist from enemy forces, Vin is tasked with protecting his family, which includes his wife, four children, an infant and a pet duck. Armed with sippers, baby carriers and his guns he must make sure he can don the role of 'The Pacifier' in the tumultuous course of events. (Film - Family)

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: An alien race destroys major cities of the world with their advanced weaponry. However, a geek, a pilot, the US President and a group of ragtag survivors unite to save mankind from annihilation. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: The Little Mermaid
programme.desc: Ariel, a mermaid, flouts rules of the mermaid kingdom and gets fascinated with the human world. When she meets Prince Eric, she falls in love with him and resolves to find a way to be with him. In the process, she ends up striking a dangerous deal with Ursula, a sea witch. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: G-Force
programme.desc: This action adventure movie is directed by Hoyt Yeatman and Hoyt Yeatman IV. The tale of four hamsters on a dangerous mission, led by a brown hamster, Darwin voiced by Sam Rockwell. His team members include Mooch, Juarez and Speckles, all of whom bring a little bit of madness to the mission. The prolific Nicholas Cage lends his voice to play Speckles, while comedians Tracy Morgan and Dee Bradley Baker voice Juarez and Mooch respectively. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: A Bug's Life
programme.desc: Flik, an odd ball of an ant, may be pint sized but he has tremendous courage. When the anthill he resides in is threatened by arrogant grasshoppers, he sets out to create an army to deal with them, recruiting the most incompetent bugs of course. A man with exceptional humour inducing skills, Dave Foley lends his voice to play Flik. Directors John Lasseter, and Andrew Stanton procure some of the biggest names on television and film for 'A Bug's Life'. Julia Louis-Dreyfuss, Kevin Spacey and Hayden Pannettiere are but a few. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes program that includes the making and a chat with the cast and crew of the movie. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
programme.desc: The film, which is a directorial debut of Joe Johnston, tells the story of an absent-minded inventor who leaves his latest creation, an electromagnetic shrinking machine, unattended in his attic. The machine shrinks his and his neighbour's kids to 1/4-th of an inch, when they accidentally trigger it. When the newly tiny youngsters are tossed out with the trash, they must survive the long journey across the lawn. (Film - Family)

programme.title: Toy Story 2
programme.desc: When Woody is toy-napped by a greedy toy collector and is nowhere to be found, Buzz and his friends set out to rescue him. But Woody too is tempted by the idea of becoming immortal in a museum. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Aladdin
programme.desc: Aladdin, a kind-hearted street urchin, falls in love at the first sight of Princess Jasmine, the princess of Agrabah. When he stumbles upon a magic lamp, Aladdin uses the powers of the magical Genie to make himself a wealthy prince so that he can marry the princess. On the other hand, danger is lurking around Agrabah in the form of an evil sorcerer, Jafar. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Skyscraper
programme.desc: War veteran Will Sawyer is entrusted with the task of assessing the security of a high-profile building in China. He gets framed when aides of an international terrorist hack into the security system of the building. Sawyer then struggles to prove his innocence and save his family trapped in the fire. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Ferdinand
programme.desc: A soft-hearted bull, Ferdinand, escapes from Casa del Toro after his father does not return from the bullfight. However, due to a turn of events, he is taken back to the place he escaped from. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: War For The Planet Of The Apes
programme.desc: The Alpha Omega, a paramilitary faction, attacks Caesar's clan, killing his wife and the oldest son. Angered, Caeser rallies his army to take revenge from Colonel, the man behind the faction. Battling his own dark instincts, he decides to lead a final confrontation that will determine the future of the planet. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Cars 3
programme.desc: The third film in this animation franchise follows Lightning McQueen, who enlists the help of race technician Cruz Ramirez to get back in the racing game after the rise of a younger, faster generation of racers. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Incredibles
programme.desc: Winning the 77th Academy award for the Best Animated feature, the film directed by Brad Bird, revolves around a family of superheroes who are forced to hide their superpowers and lead mundane lives due to several lawsuits filed against them. Although, Mr. Incredible's desire to help people drags the whole family into a battle with the evil Syndrome who has been responsible for murdering countless retired superheroes. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Dragonball: Evolution
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Night At The Museum: Secret Of The Tomb
programme.desc: The endearing museum security guard Larry Daley discovers that the Tablet of Ahkmenrah is corroding and the exhibits will not be able to come to life at night. After learning that the secret to restoring it lies with Ahkmenrah's parents, he sets out on a wild adventure across the globe to save the museum's precious inhabitants. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: X-Men: First Class
programme.desc: Director genius Matthew Vaughn brings a boisterous and visually engaging tale portraying the origins of the mutant community, packed with talented stars like James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender, Nicholas Hoult, Jennifer Lawrence and January Jones. Set in the backdrop of the Cuban Missile Crisis in 1962, a group of X-men discover their bizarre and formidable powers, which helps them fight against the ruthless dictator who's waiting to wage a war against the man- and mutant-kind. (Film - Action)

Fearing that he may be caught, he escapes in a hot air balloon. A strong tornado sweeps his balloon to the Land of Oz where he meets Theodora, a naive witch. Theodora assumes that he is a wizard hired to kill her competitor, the Wicked Witch. (Film - Adventure)

programme.desc: After successfully completing graduation, Johnny Rico joins a military group and begins his training. Soon, he finds himself battling gigantic alien bug-like creatures who are on a mission to destroy Earth. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Oz The Great And Powerful
programme.desc: Oscar Diggs, a magician, works in a travelling circus in Kansas. Known to have a reputation of being a womaniser, Oscar falls in love with the circus strongman's wife. Fearing that he may be caught, he escapes in a hot air balloon. A strong tornado sweeps his balloon to the Land of Oz where he meets Theodora, a naive witch. Theodora assumes that he is a wizard hired to kill her competitor, the Wicked Witch. (Film - Adventure)

programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: The Thing About Harry
programme.desc: Sam, a young gay man, is forced to share a ride with his high school enemy, Harry. However, things soon change between them when Sam learns that Harry is pansexual. (Film - Tele Film)

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: When NASA learns that an enormous asteroid is all set to destroy Earth, it recruits Harry, a deep sea oil driller, and his crew, in order to drill a hole in the asteroid and plant a nuclear bomb in it. In the midst of this, Harry must also deal with his daughter's lover, who is a part of the mission. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: The Jungle Book
programme.desc: Mowgli, a boy raised by wolves, is forced to go to the human village by his friend Bagheera and the animal clan when a man-eating tiger vows to kill him. Along the way, he meets a lazy bear, Baloo, a vicious snake, Kaa, and a smooth-talking ape, King Louie. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Rio
programme.desc: The iconic voices of Jesse Eisenberg, Anne Hathaway, will.i.am and Jamie Foxx come together in this adventure comedy, 'Rio', which circles around a male macaw, Blu, who is uprooted from his domesticated life and taken to Rio de Janeiro to mate with a female of his species, Jewel, and save his kind from extinction. However, when the macaws are kidnapped by smugglers there, they befriend other birds who help them in their adventurous journey towards freedom. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Lucy in the Sky
programme.desc: Lucy Cola, an astronaut, returns to Earth from her first space mission and begins to feel disconnected from normal life. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Avengers: Age Of Ultron
programme.desc: The second instalment of the 'Avengers' franchise brings the superheroes back together and this time, the stakes are higher than ever. With a view to stop the world from fighting anymore, Tony Stark enlists Bruce Banner's help to create an artificial intelligence called Ultron. But Tony's habit of playing God will end up costing the world as Ultron's personality takes charge of a robot's body, manufacturing several more like himself to declare war on the human race. Iron Man, Hulk, Captain America, Thor, Hawkeye and Black Widow are joined by a trusted few as they take on this very dangerous villain. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Lion King
programme.desc: Directed by Roger Allers and Rob Minkoff, 'The Lion King' follows the life of the endearing young lion Simba who is the heir to the throne of his father Mufasa who rules the animal kingdom. But Simba's evil uncle Scar plots to kill him and his father to occupy the throne. The plan succeeds partially with Mufasa being bumped off by Scar. Simba manages to escape and returns to his birthplace on becoming an adult only to see Scar as the ruler. He immediately plots to take over the kingdom with his pals. But wily Scar is no minnow. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Commando - A One Man Army
programme.desc: Commando of the Indian army, Karanvir Dogra (Vidyut Jammwal) escapes from China (where he was in the custody of the Chinese army after being falsely implicated as an Indian spy and mercilessly tortured thereafter) to India (albeit in miraculous circumstances). Here, at a small town close to the Punjab-Himachal Pradesh border, he bumps into Simrit (Pooja Chopra), who has run away from her home after facing a lot of harassment from the eccentric and much-feared local politician, AK74 (Jaideep Ahlawat). Thus begins the action extravaganza of a cat and mouse game. (Action)

programme.title: Ghatak: Lethal
programme.desc: A small town in Bombay is brutally subdued by a notorious gangster named Katya and his brothers. (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Dilwale
programme.desc: The Police Commissioner, Advocate Sinha and Police Inspector Vikram Singh arrive at the Central Mental Hospital to speak with an inmate, Arun Saxena. They hope to get Vikram to befriend Arun so that they could unravel the mystery as to why Arun ended up romancing wealthy Sapna, then getting involved with Jyoti, and subsequently killing her. Arun is arrested, confesses to the the homicide and is sentenced to be hanged. This news unsettles Arun to such an extend that he becomes mentally unstable and is institutionalized. Vikram hopes to befriend Arun, get him cured and medically discharged, and ensure that he is hanged. (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Inteha
programme.desc: Tina Saxena lives a wealthy life-style with her widowed businessman dad. One day, all of a sudden, she gets a nasty shock when her dad informs her that he had a mistress before he was married to her mother, and that this affair had resulted in the birth of a daughter, Nandini. Much to Tina's distaste, he invites Nandini to live with them, and asks her to look after Tina after he passes away, as he has been ill for quite sometime. Mr. Saxena does pass away, leaving a grieving Tina and Nandini, with Tina still having nothing to do with her step-sister. Then a dashing young man, Ranbir Oberoi, enters Tina's life and it is love at first sight for them. Nandini also approves of him, and it looks like Tina has given up on her dislike for Nandini. After a few days, and a purse-snatching incident, Nandini counsels Tina that she should consider breaking up with Ranbir. Aghast at this sudden volte face. (Drama,Thriller)

programme.title: Saaya
programme.desc: Tanya is a rich woman who is married to another rich man named Vinod. But their lives change by Vinod's death. Tanya than starts falling in love with a doctor named Akash. But Akash is in love with a woman named Maya and after some time gets married to her. But their marriage does not last long. Because, first Maya leaves him to travel to another part of India to help people who are sick; and then Akash receives news that she is dead. Tanya comes up to console Akash and hopes that he will now love, accept and marry her. But Akash does not do so, as he is still immersed in Maya's memories, and believes that Maya is still alive and calling out to him. Is Akash going out of his mind? (Horror,Mystery,Romance)

programme.title: Pyar Ki Kahani
programme.desc: Although well qualified, Ram Chand is unable to obtain suitable employment, and works as a peon in an organization. One day he meets with Ravi Chand, who is on the verge of committing suicide, he counsels him against this, as well as permits him to live with him. Ravi gets employed in the same office as Ram, albeit as a Manager, and falls in love and marries a co-worker named Lata. Ram's parents would like him to get married too, and he goes to see them and meets his bride-to-be, Kusum Sharma. Ram sends a photograph of Kusum for approval to Ravi and Lata, and is disappointed to learn that Ravi does not approve of Kusum. When Ram attempts to find out the reason behind his disapproval, Ravi gives very elusive responses, and Ram takes it upon himself to find out why Ravi disapproves of Kusum so much. It is then Ram will come to know of the shocking truth behind the relationship between Kusum and Ravi, and about Kusum's reputation. (Comedy,Drama,Family)

programme.title: Katilon Ke Kaatil
programme.desc: A weather widow spends her life searching for her two missing sons to bestoy her fortune on. When she finally finds two young men, are they who they seem? (Action,Thriller)

programme.title: Hirasaat
programme.desc: Assistant Commissioner of Police Ashok Saxena lives a middle-classed lifestyle along with his wife, Shobha, a former street dancer; and a younger college-going brother, Rajesh. His father was also a police officer, and he wanted Rajesh to become a police officer. He is honest to a fault, but ends up getting arrested for drug-trafficking, and suspects that Rajesh has taken to a life of crime in order to satisfy the wealthy father of his sweetheart, Renu. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Mela
programme.desc: Roopa, a beautiful young village belle is much loved by the villagers of Chandanpur. Chandanpur celebrates a huge Mela every year and this year, they invite a Minister to inaugurate it. In an assassination attempt that follows, a massacre takes place. Chandanpur is devastated and Roopa's family gets wiped out. She vows revenge. Into her life enter two men, the gregarious Kishan and the volatile Shankar, causing much upheaval in their relationship. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Run
programme.desc: This action movie is filled with romance and adventure. As Abhisek fights for his life against the forces of crime and injustice, he meets Bhoomika, who captures his heart. (Action,Comedy,Romance)

programme.title: Dhaai Akshar Prem Ke
programme.desc: Karan Khanna is an orphan and a captain in the Rajputana Armed Forces. He's madly in love with beautiful model Nisha, with whom he plans to tie the knot during his next leave. On the way to... (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Jurm
programme.desc: Police Inspector Shekhar Varma lives in Khar, Bombay, along with his wife, Meena, and a school-going daughter. His office is notified that Editor Ritesh Nandy has received death threats as he come across evidence that would expose some very influential people. (Crime,Romance)

programme.title: Taqdeer Ka Tamasha
programme.desc: A single mother, Geeta, must deal with her two sons, the elder a Police Inspector Suryapratap; while the younger, Satya, a hoodlum, when both get into conflicts. Things only get worse after Satya gets arrested, arguments ensue and he leaves. He gets hired by Sheshnaag for the sole purpose of exacting vengeance against his rival, Deva. Both brothers are fated to meet again when Suryapratap decides to accumulate evidence to arrest Deva. Neither of the brothers know that Deva has an alias, and is determined to thwart any attempt for revenge nor face any charges under the Indian Penal Code. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Baadshah
programme.desc: K. Jhunjhunwala would like to locate his missing/runaway daughter, Seema Malhotra, so that he can get her married to Nitin Dharampal; Prominent businessman, Mahindra, would like to negotiate with his daughter, Sonu's kidnappers, and secure her release. And the Central Bureau of Investigation would like to protect the life of Chief Minister Gayetri Bachchan under the mission code-named "Maa", and the CBI Officer in Charge to be code-named "Baadshah". Now Baadshah happens to be a bumbling and out of work Private Investigator, who has agreed to assist Jhunjhunwala and Mahindra, and while doing so is mistaken for the CBI Agent, ends up working for the assassins, and must assassinate Gayetri or end up losing his team of four fellow-bumblers, and Mahindra's daughter. What results is hilarious chaos, with no one knowing what the other is doing, and each one being each other's suspect(s). To make matters worse Jhunjhunwala is not really Seema's dad, but someone else with an ulterior motive. (Action,Comedy)

programme.title: Daraar
programme.desc: Raj Malhotra lives with his mother, and comes from a very wealthy family. He meets Priya Bhatia, who works with a real estate agency, and instantly falls in love with her. (Thriller,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Kasam
programme.desc: Mangal Singh is the head of a village that gets it's revenue by selling cocaine. When Police Inspector Kisna finds out he goes to live incognito with the villagers to try and talk them out of dealing with drugs. He meets and falls in love with Mangal's daughter, Savi, and gets married to her. When the time comes he asks Mangal and the villagers to surrender the drugs to the police. When they agree to do so, the police are summoned, and to Kisna's horror and disbelief a large number of the villagers are gunned down, many of who die, while others, including Mangal himself, are crippled for life. The villagers no longer trust Kisna and drive him out. The police arrest Kisna, he is tried in Court and sentenced to several years in jail. Seven years later, Kisna escapes from prison and returns to the village. Nothing is the same anymore. He has a son who refuses to acknowledge him, the villagers call him a coward, Savi and Mangal will have nothing to do with him, and the new head of the village, Jinda, wants him dead at any cost.

programme.title: Devta
programme.desc: Film starring Arun Bakshi, Mithun Chakraborty and Mushtaq Khan (Action)

programme.title: Showbiz
programme.desc: Rohan Arya lives a wealthy lifestyle in Mumbai and is a professional singer with Showbiz, which is managed by Inder Raj Bahl, while Rohan's personal Manager is Shikha Verma. Rohan and Shikha are attracted to each other, and after Journalist Sharad Rajpoot publishes their photographs, both publicly announce their forthcoming engagement. Then chaos enters their lives when Rohan's car is involved in an accident while he is in the company of a prostitute named Tara. Shikha refuses to have to do anything with him, while a frenzied media focuses in on Rohan's personal life - especially after word gets out that he may have known Tara before he met Shikha. (Action,Crime,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Bhishma
programme.desc: Paro, her mother, and her brother, Natwar, find an unconscious man near their town. They bring him over to their house, nurse and nurture him back to good health, only to find out that he has the mind of a 12 year of old child, and name him Bhola. Years pass by, Paro has fallen in love with Bhola, for he rescued her from a molester, and both would like to get married. Before that could happen, Bhola is viciously attacked and left for dead by Paro's molester, and is hospitalized. While in hospital, Police Sub-Inspector Abhimanyu Verma finds out that Bhola is not who he claims to be but a homicidal maniac, wanted for killing three policemen - named Bhisma - and is possibly masquerading as a 12 year old child to hide from the police.

programme.title: Kismat
programme.desc:
A policeman’s son begins to work with criminals. Can his life be turned around?
Ajay (Govinda) is adopted and brought up by ACP Anand (Suresh Oberoi) and his biological mother Geeta (Rakhee), though the parents believe he is actually Anand’s child. Fate intervenes when Ajay begins to work with his real father, Rajan (Kabir Bedi).

programme.title: Dhadkan
programme.desc: Dhadkan is about Anjali (Shilpa Shetty) who is a girl that hails from an extremely rich and influential family. Her father Mr. Chauhan (Kiran Kumar) is a renowned businessman and has many dreams for his daughter. But Anjali is in love with Dev (Sunil Shetty) who is very poor & often cannot even afford to clothe himself properly. Dev also loves Anjali, wants to marry her so has to meet her father. (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Jaagruti
programme.desc: Vishal is a honest and diligent customs officer. He makes it known that he has never nor will ever accept any bribe. This does not auger well with various underworld dons, and even a member of parliament from the ruling party of India. One day Vishal is abducted and brutally killed in the presence of his younger brother, Jugnu. Jugnu himself is missing, and believed dead. Honest and diligent Gandhian Raghunath is outraged by this, and complains to the Chief Minister, Omiji. When Omiji attempts to inquire into this, his son is framed for selling tainted glucose in hospitals, which results in several deaths. Powerless to act, Omiji hesitates, and as a result Raghunath is killed. And then Jugnu returns, and now he must avenge his brother's death, but he is alone, and has an uphill task. (Action,Drama,Musical)

programme.title: Diljale
programme.desc: Captain Ranvir is assigned the task of apprehending two terrorists named Shaka and Dara. Upon arrival in the region, he meets with and falls in love with Radhika, the daughter of Rajasaheb, who also is a Mantri. The latter approves of him, and arranges his wedding with his daughter. Before the engagement could take place, Ranvir finds out that he has a rival in Shaka, who was in love with Radhika before, and is all set to prevent this marriage at any and costs. Ranvir decides to postpone his wedding until such time he arrests Shaka and his associates - a decision that will not only pit him against well-armed terrorists, but also result in the abduction of a bus-load of Vaishnodevi devotees - which include Radhika and her Bua. (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Tadipaar
programme.desc: Shankar (Mithun Chakraborty) is sentenced to live outside the limits of the city due to a Police case. One day he happens to rescue a woman in distress from some hoodlums and finds out that her name is Namkeen, who resembles a missing multi-millionaire Mohinidevi (Pooja Bhatt). Shankar asks Namkeen to impersonate Mohinidevi to embezzle her wealth. Namkeen agrees to do so, but the question remains: where is Mohinidevi, and what will happen to Namkeen when she is found? (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Sikka
programme.desc: Two close and very wealthy friends, Vijay and Pranlal, decide to cement their friendship to a relationship when Vijay proposes marriage on behalf of his sister, Shobha, with Pranlal's son, Amar. Pranlal agrees, and preparations are on for the marriage to take place. Vijay finds out that Pranlal and his men are using their business as a front for drugs and smuggling, and he decides to cancel the wedding. Pranlal is angry with Vijay, but refuses to give up his criminal career. When Amar finds out about his dad's spurious activities, he kills himself. Pranlal, humiliated and angered, vows to avenge Amar's death, and wants Shobha to be Amar's widow for the rest of her life, which is not acceptable to Vijay. Then Shobha meets with a handsome stranger named Jackie, who rescues her. She offers him employment with her brother's firm, and they fall in love with each other. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Mela
programme.desc: Roopa, a beautiful young village belle is much loved by the villagers of Chandanpur. Chandanpur celebrates a huge Mela every year and this year, they invite a Minister to inaugurate it. In an assassination attempt that follows, a massacre takes place. Chandanpur is devastated and Roopa's family gets wiped out. She vows revenge. Into her life enter two men, the gregarious Kishan and the volatile Shankar, causing much upheaval in their relationship. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Karishma Kudrat Ka
programme.desc: Vijay is a simple-minded widower who lives in a small rural town in India with his unmarried sister, Radha; his son; and his widowed mom. Radha is soon to be married to Sub-Inspector Raj. One day Vijay witnesses a killing of a young child by notorious bandit Bhagad Singh, and chides him. As a result, Bhagad and his gang severely beat him up, and only spare his life after Vijay's mom begs them to forgive him. But Lala Dayaluram hires Bhagad to ensure that Vijay and his family leave the town, and when they refuse Vijay is abducted, severely beaten and left for dead. An escaped convict and killer named Karan, who happens to be Vijay's exact look-alike, sees the unconscious Vijay, and decides to assume his identity, stabs him, and throws him to his death from atop a cliff. Karan then goes to live with his family. The motive for Karan to live here is merely to hide under Vijay's name until the police give up their manhunt for him. No one really notices the change in Vijay. Karan starts to frequent the nearby brothel run by Kammobai, and soon realizes that he can make a lot of money by selling young women to her. His first target that he intends to lure to Kammobai is none other than Radha, Vijay's sister. This is just one of the destructive methods he intends to employ in his new identity and there is no one who can dare to suspect nor stop him. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Yaarana
programme.desc: Yaarana is a 1981 Indian film directed by Rakesh Kumar and starring Amitabh Bachchan, Amjad Khan, Neetu Singh, Tanuja and Kader Khan. This was one of the films where Amjad Khan plays a positive role. Nearly all of his other films with Amitabh Bachchan have been where he plays a villain role. This movie became a hit at the box office. One of the plus points of the film was its music by Rajesh Roshan and lyrics by Anjaan. At least three songs "Chhookar Mere Mann Ko", "Tere Jaisa Yaar Kahan", "Saara Zamana" and "Haseeno Ka Deewana" were superhit songs and still liked. (Drama,Musical,Romance,Action)

programme.title: Mr. Natwarlal
programme.desc: Mr. Natwarlal is a 1979 Hindi Action comedy movie. Produced by Tony Glaad it is directed by Rakesh Kumar. Natwar is just a young boy when his beloved older brother and caretaker, police officer Gridharilal (Ajit), is framed for bribery by sinister criminal mastermind Vikram (Amjad Khan). When he grows up, Natwar (Amitabh Bachchan) creates a secret identity for himself, posing as a powerful and mysterious underworld figure named Mr. Natwarlal, determined to slowly but surely exact vengeance on Vikram. - via Wikipedia ( http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mr._Natwarlal ) (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Yeh Hai Mumbai Meri Jaan
programme.desc: Raju comes to Mumbai in search of a job and becomes a peon for a big firm. He soon discovers that certain people are scheming to make the company go bankrupt. (Action,Comedy,Romance)

programme.title: Shiva Shakti
programme.desc: Shiva travels to the city to earn money for his sister Kusum's marriage. He meets Shakti and they become friends. When Kusum gets pregnant with Shakti's child, Shiva vows to murder him. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Aakhri Ghulam
programme.desc: Young Bheema is told by his father, Dinu, that generations of their family have always been slaves to the wealthy Thakurs. When Bheema does not heed this, and not only befriends Sonam, Thakur Daulat Singh's daughter, but also has a physical altercation with Raja Bahadur, Thakur's son, he is publicly whipped. Shortly thereafter his dad passes away after being bitten by a snake. Daulat finds out that Sonam likes Bheema and has her moved to London, and ensures that she forgets him. Subsequently, on her return as an adult she returns home and is told that Bheema is serving 3 years in prison for killing a male named Shamsher Singh. Nevertheless, she renews her friendship with him but will soon find him on the run from the Police - this time for killing a union leader named Kumar. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Taqdeer Ka Tamasha
programme.desc: A single mother, Geeta, must deal with her two sons, the elder a Police Inspector Suryapratap; while the younger, Satya, a hoodlum, when both get into conflicts. Things only get worse after Satya gets arrested, arguments ensue and he leaves. He gets hired by Sheshnaag for the sole purpose of exacting vengeance against his rival, Deva. Both brothers are fated to meet again when Suryapratap decides to accumulate evidence to arrest Deva. Neither of the brothers know that Deva has an alias, and is determined to thwart any attempt for revenge nor face any charges under the Indian Penal Code. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Aaj Ka Ravan
programme.desc: A series of unfortunate events plague journalist Shanti after a fellow journalist is shot to death on her doorstep

programme.title: Jeena Marna Tere Sang
programme.desc: Amar is the son of a millionaire. He decides to avenge on Asha for slapping him in public, but later falls for her. He also discovers the truth about his father. (Romance,Drama,Family)

programme.title: Tumsa Nahin Dekha
programme.desc: Daksh Mittal (Emraan Hashmi) is a charming and continually drunk millionaire. One day, he sees a girl, Jia (Dia Mirza), on the street and falls madly in love with her (Music,Romance)

programme.title: Nazar Ke Samne
programme.desc: Umesh is accused of killing a newspaper editor. His wife and mother hire a reputed lawyer named Sangram Singh Sahni, who agrees to be the defense lawyer without charging them any fees. The case is going in Umesh's favor, until a young man named Jai Kumar, comes as an eye-witness and states that he has seen Umesh commit the murder from his balcony right opposite the venue of the murder. Umesh is convicted and sentenced to death. Umesh's sister, Sarita, finds out that Jai was paid to lie, and she approaches him to change his testimony. He refuses, but subsequently relents when he finds out the havoc he has caused in their lives. He approached Advocate Sahni, who attempts to do his best to get a new trial, in vain, though and Umesh is set to die within one week. Now Jai must come up with the person who really killed the Newspaper Editor, and the only clue he has is a photograph of the killer's shoes... (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Daraar
programme.desc: Raj Malhotra lives with his mother, and comes from a very wealthy family. He meets Priya Bhatia, who works with a real estate agency, and instantly falls in love with her. (Thriller,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Ghatak: Lethal
programme.desc: A small town in Bombay is brutally subdued by a notorious gangster named Katya and his brothers. (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Dhadkan
programme.desc: Dhadkan is about Anjali (Shilpa Shetty) who is a girl that hails from an extremely rich and influential family. Her father Mr. Chauhan (Kiran Kumar) is a renowned businessman and has many dreams for his daughter. But Anjali is in love with Dev (Sunil Shetty) who is very poor & often cannot even afford to clothe himself properly. Dev also loves Anjali, wants to marry her so has to meet her father. (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Diljale
programme.desc: Captain Ranvir is assigned the task of apprehending two terrorists named Shaka and Dara. Upon arrival in the region, he meets with and falls in love with Radhika, the daughter of Rajasaheb, who also is a Mantri. The latter approves of him, and arranges his wedding with his daughter. Before the engagement could take place, Ranvir finds out that he has a rival in Shaka, who was in love with Radhika before, and is all set to prevent this marriage at any and costs. Ranvir decides to postpone his wedding until such time he arrests Shaka and his associates - a decision that will not only pit him against well-armed terrorists, but also result in the abduction of a bus-load of Vaishnodevi devotees - which include Radhika and her Bua. (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Dangal
programme.desc: Dangal is an extraordinary true story based on the life of Mahavir Singh and his two daughters, Geeta and Babita Phogat. The film traces the inspirational journey of a father who trains his daughters to become world class wrestlers. (Drama)

programme.title: Uri: The Surgical Strike
programme.desc: Following the roguish terrorist attacks at Uri Army Base camp in Kashmir, India takes the fight to the enemy, in its most successful covert operation till date with one and only one objective of avenging their fallen heroes. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Commando 3
programme.desc: A mysterious man is on an impending mission to attack the country from his base in London. Karan Singh Dogra sets out to hunt down the antagonist aided by the British Intelligence. Will Commando be able to prevent the attack and save the country? (Action,Thriller)

programme.title: Rowdy Rakshak
programme.desc: A young man is given the responsibility of protecting the Indian prime minister from terrorists. However, he is unsuccessful and takes it upon himself to find the assassins. (Action)

programme.title: Gunjan Saxena: The Kargil Girl
programme.desc: Inspired by the life of a fearless young officer who made history by becoming the first Indian female Air Force officer to fly in a combat zone during the 1999 Kargil War (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Jaan Se Pyara
programme.desc: A man tries to lead a double life as a Cop and at the same time look after his retarded twin brother and devoted mother. But then his dangerous police work comes in the way of his family life causing tragedy. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Prem Deewane
programme.desc: Radha (Pooja Bhatt) and Manohar (Vivek Mushran) love each other and want to get married, but Radha's dad (Ashok Saraf) does not approve of their marriage as Manohar comes from a poor family. He instructs Radha not to leave the house, but Radha finds a way to escape and goes to Manohar's house. Anticipating more obstacles, they run away, guided by Radha's uncle Natwarlal(Prem Chopra). Natwarlal convinces them that they must kidnap a wealthy person and demand a big ransom and take the money to appease Radha's dad. It is then they start to realize that their uncle has some other devious plans for them. (Action,Adventure,Drama,Thriller)

programme.title: Baadshah
programme.desc: K. Jhunjhunwala would like to locate his missing/runaway daughter, Seema Malhotra, so that he can get her married to Nitin Dharampal; Prominent businessman, Mahindra, would like to negotiate with his daughter, Sonu's kidnappers, and secure her release. And the Central Bureau of Investigation would like to protect the life of Chief Minister Gayetri Bachchan under the mission code-named "Maa", and the CBI Officer in Charge to be code-named "Baadshah". Now Baadshah happens to be a bumbling and out of work Private Investigator, who has agreed to assist Jhunjhunwala and Mahindra, and while doing so is mistaken for the CBI Agent, ends up working for the assassins, and must assassinate Gayetri or end up losing his team of four fellow-bumblers, and Mahindra's daughter. What results is hilarious chaos, with no one knowing what the other is doing, and each one being each other's suspect(s). To make matters worse Jhunjhunwala is not really Seema's dad, but someone else with an ulterior motive. (Action,Comedy)

programme.title: Gunaah
programme.desc: Tough cop Prabha (Bipasha Basu) is haunted by the demons of her past. Being an illegitimate daughter of a prostitute, she has had a very bad childhood and there once occurred an incident in her life when she was driven to the point of committing a murder. But today, now that she is a cop, she believes that she can clear her conscience by reforming a criminal. Prabha's life is turned topsy-turvy with the entry of Aditya (Dino Morea), who is a good person at heart but was forced to take the path of crime due to the wrong doing of the system. Prabha goes to Aditya's house to nab him, but gets carried away when she sees him bathing. Aditya slips from under her vigilant eyes and a hasty chase follows. Prabha stays close on the heels of fleeing Aditya. At one point when she is about to fall off the rooftop Aditya stops running and extends his hand to save her. This act makes a great impact on Prabha. Prabha decides to know Aditya's past and find out what prompted him to commit crime in the first place. She decides to reform him but herself gets 'reformed' into loving him in the process. (Drama)

programme.title: Johny I Love You
programme.desc: Son of reformed criminal Suraj Singh, Johny (formerly Raju) falls in love with a woman out of his caste. (Action,Romance)

programme.title: Cover Story
programme.desc: A retired judge is brutally shot and with his murderer still at large, his visually impaired neighbor becomes a prime suspect. (Thriller,Action,Family)

programme.title: 15th August
programme.desc: Nagpal kills Chaudhry and his son, Ram, a military officer. Chaudhry's second son, Vikram, vows to destroy Nagpal who is all set to become the Chief Minister on the upcoming Indian Independence Day.

programme.title: Qayamat
programme.desc: CBI Officer Akram Sheikh (Sunil Shetty) is on the verge of nabbing three dreaded Pakistan-backed arms dealers , the brothers Ali (Arbaaz Khan) and Abbas (Sanjay Kapoor) and their common moll Laila (Isha Koppikar) . When Sheikh busts an important arms deal conducted by his three targets , Ali-Abbas join forces with Gopal (Chunky Pandey) , a corrupt scientist to get hold of a deadly virus and take the tourists at the Elphinstone Jail resort as hostage . Akram Sheikh is now compelled to get help from Rachit (Ajay Devgan) , a criminal serving jail time who was a former associate of Ali-Abbas and the only person in history to have successfully escaped the Elphinstone jail . Along with a commando team , they try to pull off a rescue attempt by breaking in the jail and rescuing the hostages . (Action,Romance,Thriller)

programme.title: Fukrey Returns
programme.desc: A year after the first movie, the four friends are enjoying their lives to the fullest, get in trouble once again with Bholi, who is released from prison earlier than expected and is broke. (Comedy,Drama)

programme.title: Bruce Lee
programme.desc: When a stuntman is mistaken for a police officer, he begins fighting crime. (Romance,Action,Drama)

programme.title: Bulandi
programme.desc: A noble family presides over a small town in India. (Foreign)

programme.title: The Real Tevar
programme.desc: Harsha, a multi-millionaire guy who has everything but there is something else he's looking for and in the process he adopts a complete village trying to bring change in the people. (Romance,Action,Family,Drama)

programme.title: Qayamat
programme.desc: CBI Officer Akram Sheikh (Sunil Shetty) is on the verge of nabbing three dreaded Pakistan-backed arms dealers , the brothers Ali (Arbaaz Khan) and Abbas (Sanjay Kapoor) and their common moll Laila (Isha Koppikar) . When Sheikh busts an important arms deal conducted by his three targets , Ali-Abbas join forces with Gopal (Chunky Pandey) , a corrupt scientist to get hold of a deadly virus and take the tourists at the Elphinstone Jail resort as hostage . Akram Sheikh is now compelled to get help from Rachit (Ajay Devgan) , a criminal serving jail time who was a former associate of Ali-Abbas and the only person in history to have successfully escaped the Elphinstone jail . Along with a commando team , they try to pull off a rescue attempt by breaking in the jail and rescuing the hostages . (Action,Romance,Thriller)

programme.title: The Strangers
programme.desc: After returning from a wedding reception, a couple staying in an isolated vacation house receive a knock on the door in the mid-hours of the night. What ensues is a violent invasion by three strangers, their faces hidden behind masks. The couple find themselves in a violent struggle, in which they go beyond what either of them thought capable in order to survive. (Thriller,Horror,Mystery)

programme.title: Heartless
programme.desc: A young man, Aditya Singh (Adhyayan), who fell deeply in love with a beautiful girl (Ariana). Soon he had a severe heart-attack, and when consulted with his doctor-friend (Shekhar Suman), he then suggested him to do a heart-transplant. As Aditya lands in the operation theatre, some bizarre thing happens in his life, and lots of unsaid and controversial betrayed story unfolds. (Drama,Family,Romance,Thriller)

programme.title: The Ugly Truth
programme.desc: A romantically challenged morning show producer is reluctantly embroiled in a series of outrageous tests by her chauvinistic correspondent to prove his theories on relationships and help her find love. His clever ploys, however, lead to an unexpected result. (Comedy,Romance)

programme.title: Kesari
programme.desc: The story of Havildar Ishar Singh who participates in the Battle of Saragarhi (in which an army of 21 Sikhs fought against 10,000 Afghans in 1897) while yearning for the respect of his estranged daughter. (Action,Drama,History)

programme.title: CID
programme.desc: ACP Pradyuman, Daya and Abhijeet are an elite trio of officers who work for the CID. They seek the help of professional forensic expert Dr. Salunkhe and solve high-profile criminal cases. (Detective)

programme.title: Udaariyan
programme.desc: Fateh imagines uncovering the truth to Tejo about his feelings towards Jasmine. Later, Fateh decides to take Tejo out for dinner. (Drama)

programme.title: Sasural Simar Ka 2
programme.desc: Gitanjali Devi entrusts Simar Bhardwaj with the task of finding an ideal bride for her grandson. Simar's quest ends when she meets her namesake, Simar Narayan, who dreams of making it big as a singer. (Drama)

programme.title: Balika Vadhu 2
programme.desc: Before her birth, Anandi's father fixes her marriage with his best friend's son. As she turns a few years older, talks of her wedding soon gain momentum. (Drama)

programme.title: Ek Shringaar Swabhiman
programme.desc: Ek Shringaar Swabhimaan celebrates the courage and pride of a small-town single mother, Sharda, and the values and strengths with which she empowers her young daughters, Meghna and Naina. As different as chalk and cheese, the fiercely independent girls have only one thing in common, their undying devotion towards their mother. Facing several hardships in an orthodox society, Sharda has provided the best upbringing and education to her girls. But what happens when it''s time to find matches for her highly educated daughters? A single twist of fate will change everything forever! (Drama)

programme.title: Thapki Pyar Ki
programme.desc: The bright and beautiful Thapki is pretty much perfect... except for one minor flaw - she stammers. But that doesn't hold her back. All she needs is an encouraging pat on the back,a 'thapki', which soon becomes her name. Over the course of the show, Thapki falls in love with Dhruv, but is duped into getting married to his brother, Bihaan. In spite of this cruel twist of fate, Thapki doesn't let her spirit fade and does all she can to be the ideal bahu. What does destiny hold for this charming girl with an unbeatable spirit?"
